portfolios.title: Creator
portfolios.description:
Built a full-stack application where a user can view clothes, add to cart, and make a purchase.
Built a database to store clothing information using MongoDB. 
Implemented firebase plugin for auth authentication. 
Built graphs using Google Charts library and jQuery for visualization of sales metrics.
portfolios.techStack: React | Redux | MongoDB | Cloudinary Api | Firebase | Javascript
